entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 08 March 2023
